price: 27. Luego, Al-lah aceptó el arrepentimiento de quienes quiso (una vez abrazaron el islam). Y Al-lah es Indulgente y Misericordioso.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
